decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( TRFC-10A, Light Structure Green Lighting System specification sheet and LED luminaire sheet, Twickenham Rugby Football Club Bat Assessment Survey and Bat Activity Survey and covering letter received on 14/10/2015 and File #170891C dated 09/03/2016 (Illumination Summary and Equipment Layout; 6 pages) received on 21/03/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The floodlights hereby permitted shall not be used more than 10 Fridays in each calendar year and shall not be used outside the hours of 09.00-21.30 on such Fridays. The floodlights hereby permitted shall not be used outside the hours of 09.00 - 18.00 on Saturdays. The floodlighting hereby approved shall not be used on any other day of the week or at any other time, other than those set out above unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. A yearly log of the Friday dates on which the floodlights are operated shall be kept by the Club and this shall be available for inspection by the Council on request.

Condition : 4 - The floodlights hereby permitted shall be installed and thereafter maintained in accordance with the approved plans and specifications (Light Structure Green Lighting System specification sheet and LED luminaire sheet, Covering letter received on 14/10/2015 and File #170891C dated 09/03/2016 (Illumination Summary and Equipment Layout; 6 pages) received on 21/03/2016)
description: Installation of six 15 m high flood lights for one pitch in the eastern corner of the site adjacent to the clubhouse changing rooms.3
